lexUnit.name: casserole.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a large dish with a lid, used for cooking food slowly in an oven

sentence.text: ` Such a middle-class way of carrying on , " she thought , and remembered how Gabriel and she had revelled in roast beef and two veg , and concocted casseroles of liver and sausages and baked beans .
